comment.author: 99585316@N00
comment._content: You have to remember that there are very little shadows in black and white pictures, it uses non-color wavelengths such as infra-red on the sliver-based film.  So anything in the shadows does shows very well in these films because infra-red reflects light better than colors.  That's why the hands and face are different, since the face is actually in the shadows of sunlight.
